QuestionTxt: (If voted in Democratic primary, ask:) Here is a list of the Republican presidential candidates (1980) on your state's primary election ballot. Who did you vote for? (If voted in Republican primary, ask:) Here is a list of the Democratic presidential candidates on your state's primary election ballot. Who did you vote for?
SubPopulation: Asked of those who had a primary election and they voted in it (36% of those with a primary, 30% of the sample) * = less than .5 percent
SurveyOrg: Survey Research Center at University of Michigan (ANES American National Election Studies); Center for Political Studies, University of Michigan
StudyNote: A post-election survey with re-interviews of 1408 (87%) of the pre-election respondents was conducted November 4, 1980-February 7, 1981.

QuestionTxt: Who do you think you will vote for in the election for President (1980)? We all know the election is some time away and that people are not certain at this point who they will vote for. Still, who do you think you will vote for in the election for President? (If don't expect to vote, ask:) If you were going to vote, who do you think you would vote for in the election for President? We all know the election is some time away and that people are not certain at this point who they might vote for. Still, who do you think you would vote for in the election for President?
SurveyOrg: Survey Research Center at University of Michigan (ANES American National Election Studies); Center for Political Studies, University of Michigan
StudyNote: A post-election survey with re-interviews of 1408 (87%) of the pre-election respondents was conducted November 4, 1980-February 7, 1981.

We all know the election is some time away and that people are not certain at this point who they might vote for. Still, who do you think you would vote for in the election for President?
SurveyOrg: Survey Research Center at University of Michigan (ANES American National Election Studies); Center for Political Studies, University of Michigan
StudyNote: A post-election survey with re-interviews of 1408 (87%) of the pre-election respondents was conducted November 4, 1980-February 7, 1981.
